current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To specify requirements for the next update of the
		  current strategic plan for the Office of Rural Health of the Department of
		  Veterans Affairs for improving access to, and the quality of, health care
		  services for veterans in rural areas.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

			 Act of 2013
